name: NSUserNotification
desc: A notification that can be scheduled for display in the notification center.DeprecatedUse the User Notifications framework instead.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: Specifies the title of the notification.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: Specifies the subtitle of the notification.

items.name: var informativeText: String?
items.desc: The body text of the notification.

items.name: var contentImage: NSImage?
items.desc: Image shown in the content of the notification.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: A string that uniquely identifies a notification.

items.name: var response: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: The response with which the user responded to a notification.

items.name: var responsePlaceholder: String?
items.desc: Optional placeholder string for inline reply field.

items.name: var hasActionButton: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the notification displays an action button.

items.name: var actionButtonTitle: String
items.desc: Specifies the title of the action button displayed in the notification.

items.name: var otherButtonTitle: String
items.desc: Specifies a custom title for the close button in an alert-style notification.

items.name: var hasReplyButton: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the notification displays a reply button.

items.name: var deliveryDate: Date?
items.desc: Specifies when the notification should be delivered.

items.name: var actualDeliveryDate: Date?
items.desc: The date this notification was actually delivered.

items.name: var deliveryRepeatInterval: DateComponents?
items.desc: Specifies the date components that control how often a user notification is repeated.

items.name: var deliveryTimeZone: TimeZone?
items.desc: Specify the time zone to interpret the delivery date in.

items.name: var isPresented: Bool
items.desc: Specifies whether the user notification has been presented.

items.name: var isRemote: Bool
items.desc: Specifies whether the remote was generated by a push notification.

items.name: var soundName: String?
items.desc: Specifies the name of the sound to play when the notification is delivered.

items.name: var activationType: NSUserNotification.ActivationType
items.desc: Specifies what caused a user notification to occur.

items.name: var additionalActivationAction: NSUserNotificationAction?
items.desc: An additional action selected by the user.

items.name: var additionalActions: [NSUserNotificationAction]?
items.desc: The actions that can be taken on a notification in addition to the default action.

items.name: var userInfo: [String : Any]?
items.desc: Application-specific user info that can be attached to the notification.

items.name: enum NSUserNotification.ActivationType
items.desc: These constants describe how the user notification was activated.
